name: JEurekha
short_description: JEurecha is a collection of algorithms for Clusteing and Text Minig. The basis of the development is the dissertation of teacher Dr. Leandro Krug Wives. Currently the project only implements the algorithm Clicks for Clustering. We have plans to join other algorithms such as K-means. The project is developed in Java. Just add the jar file in your project and with few lines of code you will have a powerful tool for Clustering / Text mining.
